headline: CodeHS is a comprehensive platform helping schools teach computerâ¦
description: CodeHS is a comprehensive teaching platform for helping schools teach computer science. We provide web-based curriculum, teacher tools and resources, and professional development.

founders.name: Jeremy Keeshin, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Jeremy Keeshin is the CEO and co-founder of CodeHS, a comprehensive online platform to teach computer science to high schools and middle schools. He is a leading expert in computer science education and education technology.

# The Top Coding and Computer Science Platform for K-12 Schools
[Login](https://codehs.com/</login>) [Sign up For Free](https://codehs.com/</core/signup/begin>)
Watch How CodeHS Works 
## Everything You Need, All In One Spot
CodeHS is trusted by thousands of teachers and schools all over the world.
### [LMS](https://codehs.com/</lms>)
Classroom management tools and integrations for student rosters, data, assignments, and grades.
### [Curriculum](https://codehs.com/</curriculum>)
Comprehensive computer science curriculum for grades K-12 including hands-on elementary lessons and over 100 customizable courses in various programming languages. 
### [IDE](https://codehs.com/</ide>)
Write, run, and debug code in 10+ languages right in your browser - no downloads needed!
### [Certifications](https://codehs.com/</info/certifications>)
Industry-relevant computer science certification exams for high school students.
### [CodeHS Pro](https://codehs.com/</pro>)
All the tools, resources, and support your school needs to run a successful computer science program.
### [Professional Development](https://codehs.com/</pd>)
Quality in-person, online, and virtual professional development for new and experienced teachers.
## Online IDE Built for Education
Write, run, & debug code in any web browser, no account or downloads needed. Available in more than 10+ programming languages!
[Start Coding ](https://codehs.com/</ide>)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/homepage/editor.png)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/marketing/pro_page/activities.png)
## Coding Learning Management System
Seamlessly manage rosters, lessons, assignments, progress, and grades for any type of classroom.
[Learn More ](https://codehs.com/</lms>)
## Customizable K-12 Computer Science Curriculum
Comprehensive computer science curriculum for grades K-12 including hands-on elementary lessons and over 100 customizable courses in various programming languages.
[Explore the K-5 Course Catalog ](https://codehs.com/</curriculum/catalog/elementary>)
[Explore the 6-12 Course Catalog ](https://codehs.com/</curriculum/catalog>)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/courses/intro_cs.png)

[Learn More ](https://codehs.com/</course/1/overview>)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/courses/micro_bit.png)
### Physical Computing with micro:bit
[Learn More ](https://codehs.com/</course/4065/overview>)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/courses/intro_python.png)
### Introduction to Computer Science in Python
[Learn More ](https://codehs.com/</course/5657/overview>)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/courses/cyber_security.png)
### Fundamentals of Cybersecurity
[Learn More ](https://codehs.com/</course/6560/overview>)

Charles Olson

## CodeHS Pro
All the tools, resources, and dedicated support your school needs to implement and run a high-quality computer science program.
[Learn More ](https://codehs.com/</pro>)
## Industry-Relevant Certifications
Give high school students a competitive advantage entering college or the workforce with the opportunity to demonstrate their mastery of programming skills.
[Learn More ](https://codehs.com/</info/certifications>)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/homepage/badge_collage.png)
![](https://static1.codehs.com/img/homepage/pd.png)
## Top-Notch Professional Development
Online and in-person training for teachers to build the knowledge and confidence to teach excellent computer science courses.
[Explore CodeHS PD ](https://codehs.com/</pd>)
“
> For district administrators, CodeHS is a silver bullet!
Aaron Grill
Administrator at The Browning School, New York, NY
## Join the CodeHS Community
There are many ways to get involved and network with new or experienced computer science teachers, just like you! 
[ Create a Free Teacher Account ](https://codehs.com/</core/signup/begin>) [ Join the CodeHS Facebook Group](https://codehs.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/groups/codehseducators>) [ Become a CodeHS Certified Educator](https://codehs.com/</info/certified_educators>)

**Company Overview: CodeHS**

Founded in 2012 and based in Chicago, IL, CodeHS is a dynamic educational platform designed to empower schools in teaching computer science. As part of Y Combinator's Batch IK12, the company has made significant strides in the educational landscape, striving to make coding and computer science accessible to all students.

### Mission
CodeHS aims to provide a comprehensive solution for schools to teach computer science effectively. They focus on delivering web-based curricula, teacher tools, and professional development resources, ensuring educators and students have what they need to succeed.

### The Team
With a dedicated workforce of 83 employees, CodeHS is committed to advancing computer science education. Their partnerships and collaborations are instrumental in expanding their reach and improving their offerings.

### Product Offering
CodeHS features an array of products tailored for districts, schools, and teachers:
- **Coding LMS**: A Learning Management System for managing rosters, assignments, and student data seamlessly.
- **Online IDE**: A powerful integrated development environment where students can write, run, and debug code across multiple languages without the hassle of downloads.
- **Curriculum**: A customizable K-12 curriculum that includes over 100 courses and hands-on lessons, ranging from introductory coding to advanced computer science topics.
- **Certifications**: These help high school students gain industry-relevant skills, giving them a competitive edge.
- **CodeHS Pro**: This package provides schools with all necessary tools, resources, and support for a successful computer science program.
- **Professional Development**: CodeHS offers both online and in-person training for teachers, empowering them with the knowledge to effectively teach computer science.

### Use Cases
CodeHS is designed with various educational stakeholders in mind:
- **Districts** benefit from streamlined processes and comprehensive curriculum resources.
- **Schools** find it easier to implement and manage computer science programs that engage students.
- **Teachers** gain access to resources, training, and communities that support successful teaching methodologies.

### Why CodeHS?
CodeHS has garnered attention and trust from teachers and educators worldwide, boasting testimonials that highlight its effectiveness in reducing administrative burdens and enhancing student learning experiences. 

In an increasingly digital world, CodeHS strives to create pathways for every student to learn coding and computer science, ensuring they are prepared for future opportunities. Interested parties can explore more about CodeHS at [codehs.com](https://codehs.com).

---

This summary encapsulates CodeHS's core mission, offerings, and impact, emphasizing its role in educating the next generation in computer science.
